entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
